text: Crepidophryne is a genus of toads commonly called Cerro Utyum Toads. The genus has three species. They live throughout the Costa Rican and Panamian highlands. == Species == Binomial Name and Author Common Name Crepidophryne chompipe Crepidophryne epiotica Cerro Utyum Toad Crepidophryne guanacaste ==Other websites== * . 2007.
